description: Bluntisham is located in Cambridgeshire near the River Ouse and the villages of Somersham and Earith. The Pathfinder Long Distance Walk and the Ouse Valley Way both pass through the village. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Bluntisham. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
display_address: High Street, Bluntisham, Huntingdonshire, Cambridgeshire, Cambridgeshire and Peterborough, England, PE28 3LA, United Kingdom
